5. Navigating the Browse-R¶

This section provides a tour of the capabilities of the browser.

The Shiny Browse-R is viewed using a standard web browser. It is known to work on Firefox 30.0, and reports of (in)compatibility on other platforms is appreciated.

<URL format>

Here is a working instance of the Shiny browser: insert Gist URL here

5.1. Select a dataset¶

Pick a dataset. Click “make active dataset”. If you don’t see a dataset, add one (see section on adding dataset).

Select a dataset
